meanings: (허튼소리) nonsense, drivel, (informal) gibberish, (S) baloney, (impolite) crap, (impolite) bullshit, (Am, inf) garbage, (Brit) rubbish
utter meaningless words while sick with a high fever

vlive.korean: [앨범 보여준다더니 태양을 똑 떼온] 헛소리였고요... [He took his sun from the sky instead of his CD] I was joking. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [RAVI] 엘도라도의 의인화 엘도라비 아닐리 없어..✨🤩 (RAVI’s ‘EL DORADO’ album countdown V)
vlive.english: [He took his sun from the sky instead of his CD] I was joking.

vlive.korean: 그냥 헛소리야~ I'm just saying nonsense. 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 인디 가수들과 술 마시다 라이브 쇼 하는 김준현 <김준현의짠> 6회
헛소리는 잠시 포맷하고 다시 요리로 돌아와 볼까? Shall we reformat the nonsense and return to the cooking? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 최현석, 장인어른 호칭에 예대 출신 의뢰인에게 역대급 분노 <초이가이버> 16회
vlive.english: Shall we reformat the nonsense and return to the cooking?

vlive.korean: [형의 헛소리가 이제는 익숙한 공공즈] - 봐봐 조용히 해봐! - 말로 하지 말고 이렇게... [The 00s are used to Changbin's nonsense] - See, be quiet for a second! - Don't say anything. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER GO!(슼즈토커 고!)] JAKARTA
vlive.english: [The 00s are used to Changbin's nonsense] - See, be quiet for a second! - Don't say anything.

vlive.korean: 헛소리 하지 마 임마! Stop talking nonsense! 듣기 View video MOMO X : [존예보스2] 유니티 '이현주' 편
